summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5963 for the improvement of 26th Avenue Southwest from West Juneau Street to West Genesee Street; and certain other streets and avenues; by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 79624, and levying and assessing the amounts therefor against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
